content: crochet this cute cat amigurumi plush with the diy fluffies youtube video this video is available for free in english and dutch the cat takes about 2-3 hours to make this is an easy tutorial perfect for beginners to learn how to crochet when you make the cat with cotton sport weight yarn and a 2 5 mm hook the size will be 7 cm/ 3 inch you can make it bigger by using thicker yarn and a larger crochet hook the amigurumi cat on the right has been made with super bulky chenille yarn and a 5 0 mm hook size 16 cm / 6 inch
